OOC: I'm going to start playing again. If I get any things wrong just
tell me.

::Hot Rod::

He had lost track of Unitron and the other bot. He continued to fire on
any Alliance members he saw at the CF.

::DrillBit::

He pulled back to Killfest. Dodging some random shots.
"What do we do now?"

::Dollen::

He made his way toDrillBit's side, waiting for orders.

::Demolition::

He was still in the brig on the CF.
